label: 往生記
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: [Refers to] Nihon ōjō  gokuraku ki, a collection of Japanese examples of rebirth into Amitābha's paradise, complied by Yoshishige Yasutane (p. 769n). [日本往生極楽記、慶滋保胤]
